data.name: Cult of Cards
data.detailed_description:
Cult of Cards is a co-op horror card game for 1-4 players. When an evil cult unleashes an ancient demon, all that can stop the coming apocalypse is you, your friends and a deck of cards.

STOP THE SUMMONING

  • Who’s your hero?
    Choose a unique character to play as each time you pursue victory against the cult.
  • Investigate terrifying locations
    Locate and destroy the ritual altars. You’ll find useful items such as medkits and hatchets along the way, but beware of evil cultists and the demon itself!
  • Turn-based strategy
    Noone said taking on the forces of darkness was going to be easy. Your choices will affect the outcome for the whole team, so make each turn count.

FEATURES

  • 1-4 player online co-op
    Take control of up to 4 characters in this unique online co-op experience with cross-platform support between Android, iOS and PC.
  • Single player mode
    Not for the faint of heart. In this mode, you’ll control all 4 characters and face the cult alone.
  • Replayability
    With fast and challenging gameplay, each unique playthrough of Cult of Cards is guaranteed to be a hair-raising experience.
  • Unlock new cards
    As you play, you’ll have plenty of opportunities to unlock additional cards that will enhance your gameplay and give you and your team the edge you need to win.
  • Immerse yourself
    Delve into a uniquely spine-chilling horror experience with stunning original art, music and sound effects.

Warning

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: Cult of Cards is a co-op horror card game for 1-4 players. An evil cult tries to unleash an ancient demon and all that stands between them and the apocalypse is you, your friends and a deck of cards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
